summary: Provides a collection of lightweight mock classes used in Conan's test suite to simulate core objects such as ConanFile, local authentication storage, C++ metadata, configuration settings, and redirected I/O streams, enabling isolated unit testing without external dependencies.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable and fast unit testing of Conan components by supplying in‑memory stand‑ins that replicate the behavior of real Conan objects, allowing developers to validate functionality without requiring a full Conan environment.
